# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(Ex1_1 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
# targetq
add_executable(TicTacToe "")
set_target_properties(TicTacToe PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "TicTacToe")
set_target_properties(TicTacToe PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "c:/Users/leres/Documents/PROG/Ex/build/windows/x64/debug")
set_target_properties(TicTacToe PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(TicTacToe PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(TicTacToe PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(TicTacToe PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(TicTacToe PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(TicTacToe PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET TicTacToe PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(TicTacToe PRIVATE main.cpp
)
